alert.note: Alert for Marshall (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Local Area Emergency issued July 11 at 5:01PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Local Area Emergency... The following message is transmitted at the request of Marshall County Office of Emergency Management. Missing Person Alert 83 Year Old Steve Eslinger is missing from his residence in the area of Richmond Pike and Sorrells Rd.... 3 Miles East of Petersburg... TN. He was last seen wearing a blue shirt... blue jeans... black suspenders... and slip on tennis shoes. He is 5`8" and weighs 160 lbs with gray hear. He suffers from dementia and could be in a confused state. If you have any information that could lead to locating him please notify local authorities.
